data.name: Adam P
data.bio: Solving the chest-bump level in Portal 2 Co-op.

data.name: Andrew
data.bio: Beating Riven and getting a decent ending.

data.name: Chester
data.bio: Figuring out that the best way to summon a thunderstorm is to wash your car (or, in the 1700s, your carriage) in Day of the Tentacle

data.name: Chris Ye
data.bio: Hearing the deep voice declare 'Godlike' as I pulled off my 10th consecutive kill. And then i died :(. - Unreal Tournament

data.name: Ehab
data.bio: When I figured out how Duck Hunt works on the technical side.

data.name: Elliot
data.bio: Smashing through that first steel web in Flower, just as the music picks up.

data.name: Hami
data.bio: Getting stumped in The Incredible Machine.

data.name: Jen
data.bio: Beating Emerald Weapon at the bottom of the ocean. I threw my controller across the room and shouted 'YEEEESSSS!' - Final Fantasy VII

data.name: Jeremy
data.bio: Waiting a long time for an I block in tetris, and then clearing four rows as the crowd cheered.

data.name: Justin N
data.bio: Resonance Cascade scenario.

data.name: Justin S
data.bio: Winning my first Soul Calibur tournament. Aww yeaaah.

data.name: Kyle
data.bio: After being denied, time and time again, finally getting Ben to 'put his lips on that' while siphoning gas in Full Throttle.

data.name: Maggie
data.bio: Sitting in Grade 3 class, teacher patiently waiting to start the lesson until I finally beat Krang in TMNT: Fall of the Foot Clan on my Game Boy.

data.name: Mark L
data.bio: Dominating a 10v10 Counter-Strike match with my brother using only the machine gun and constantly firing, Rambo style.

data.name: Nick
data.bio: The culmination of an incredible Journey - completing the game with a stranger who waited.

data.name: Owen
data.bio: Seeing civilisations pop out of existence as the Kohr-Ah began their death march in Star Control 2, and feeling like there really was a living, breathing galaxy to save.

data.name: Paul
data.bio: Beating Contra Co-op for the first time; witnessing the twists in Xenogears; or out-smarting Psycho Mantis were great; but nothing beats telling my god-son I made the cool zombie game he eagerly wanted to show me.

data.name: Peter H
data.bio: Watching ICO's ending and having my heart crushed ):.

data.name: Peter S
data.bio: The opening sequence of the Facility level of Goldeneye when you snipe the head of the security guard chilling in the bathroom stall. WASSUP!

data.name: Pitr
data.bio: Utterly decimating Raymond in Starcraft and making him cry.

data.name: Qbert
data.bio: Qbert is the office robot. Qbert likes Rise of the Robots. Qbert sometimes worries us.

data.name: Raymond
data.bio: Beating a player in StarCraft II who sent out a pre-emptive GG.

data.name: Rebecca
data.bio: Being chased by a mummy in Hugo's House of Horrors

data.name: Rob
data.bio: Finding my way out of the catacombs in Kings Quest VI. My basement was a creepy place to play that game.

data.name: Simon
data.bio: Finding the sunken ship for the first time in Mario 64.

data.name: Steven
data.bio: Listening to Yuzo Koshiro's Electro and clean 8 stages in Streets of Rage 2 with my brother.

data.name: Tanner
data.bio: Smashing the Lava Dragon in the face for the first time with the Megaton Hammer in Ocarina of Time.

data.name: Kaitlin
data.bio: Staying up until five am, finishing Zilart missions with my friends, to finally get Sky access in FFXI.

data.name: Elias
data.bio: My first time beating three Foxes on level 9 in Super Smash Bros. N64.

data.name: Thea
data.bio: Knights of the Old Republic.

data.name: Diogo
data.bio: Finishing Journey for the first time. That game is art at its best.

data.name: Jake
data.bio: Skipping school in grade 8 to play the Rats levels in Half-Life with friends.

data.name: Jos√©
data.bio: Being with a broken foot playing Chrono Trigger for Super Nintendo all night long.

data.name: Wayne
data.bio: Reaching the floating island in FF3/6j believing that it was the end of the game, only to have my fragile mind completely break when I realized it was really the halfway point.

data.name: Zander
data.bio: Stumbling into view of the first Colossi in Shadow of the Colossus

data.name: Brian
data.bio: On my 2nd playthrough, watching the three Magitek armors trekking through the snow towards the town of Narshe at the beginning of Final Fantasy VI with Nobuo Uetmasu's track setting the stage for the awesomeness I knew was coming.

data.name: Valerie
data.bio: Watching my dad play DOOM when it first came out. For hours, and hours.

data.name: Graham
data.bio: Getting the Invisibility cheat in Goldeneye after beating Archives in 1:20.

data.name: Mel
data.bio: Being reunited with Rydia in FFIV. Be still my heart.

data.name: Joey
data.bio: Turning off my tv and leaving my NES running overnight, so I could beat the final boss in Ninja Gaiden in the morning. Then realizing there are 3 OF THEM!!

data.name: Erica
data.bio: Having a dream about the Forest Temple in Ocarina of Time, before the game even came out. The first time I entered the temple I was flabbergasted!

data.name: Jenn
data.bio: Finally defeating Old King Allant in Demon's Souls, with my character clad in nothing but leather scraps; longest, most intense boss battle ever!

data.name: Hema
data.bio: The first time I beat a video game; Golden Axe at the arcade with my brother.

data.name: Gabriel
data.bio: Finally solving the Fire Marble Puzzle in Riven, or flying around the overworld on the back of Flammie in Secret of Mana.

data.name: Petar
data.bio: Learning to read fluently in Fez's "tetromino" alphabet, and seeing what all those NPCs had to say

data.name: Stephan
data.bio: Playing Asteroids on an original cabinet with a retro vector display.

data.name: Christine
data.bio: Having a Gamecube and PS2 and a library of games dropped in front of me after a 10 year hiatus from console games.

data.name: Ben
data.bio: Saving Peppy and Slippy for the first time in Star Fox.  I loved that game, but man those guys were useless.

data.name: Dennis
data.bio: Playing Super Mario Brothers 3 for the first time.

data.name: Alexander
data.bio: Beating Super Hexagon after hours of mind-numbing trial and error.

data.name: Adam RY
data.bio: Creating a giant foot and going to the Hand Pyramid in Commander Keen 4 (to rescue a janitor).

data.name: Robin
data.bio: Playing my first tune after finding the Orcarina of Time in the moat outside castle town.

data.name: Soha
data.bio: Seeing the first zombie in Resident Evil when I was a kid, and pretending to be totally fine.

data.name: Alex
data.bio: Figuring out the controls to Barbarian on our 286.

data.name: Hannah
data.bio: Giving myself free rare candies on Pokemon Emerald
